text: Ramy Ayach () is a Lebanese singer. He was born on August 18, 1980 in Baakleen, Lebanon. Ayach was born as the oldest child. He was raised in the mountains of Lebanon. He became aware of his music and started singing in public places. He then became one of the most popular Arabian singers in the Middle East. ==References== ==Other websites== * Ramy Ayach On Facebook * Ramy Ayach Official Website * Rotana Records Arabia Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Druze Category:Lebanese singers
title: Ramy Ayach
